pages.text: MIMI includes several keybinds that allow you to perform various actions in-game. Note that at this time the key controls associated with the Instrument GUI are not configurable.

pages.title: Stop All Notes
pages.text: Current keybind: $(l)$(k:key.mimi.midi.alloff)$()$(br2)Pressing this key immediately stops all notes that are on. This is primarily meant to be used if a note gets stuck on for a long period of time.$(br2)Note that this bind does not stop new notes from being turned on.

pages.title: MIDI Device Config GUI
pages.text: Current keybind: $(l)$(k:key.mimi.midi.settings)$()$(br2)Pressing this key opens the $(l:mididevice_config)MIDI Input Device Configuration GUI$(/l). This GUI allows you to select the system MIDI device to use for MIMI instruments that have System MIDI Input Device set for their MIDI Source.

pages.title: Transmitter GUI
pages.text: Current keybind: $(l)$(k:key.mimi.midi.playlist)$()$(br2)Pressing this key opens the $(l:transmitter_gui)Transmitter GUI$(/l) if you have at least one $(l:transmitter_usage)MIDI Transmitter$(/l) on your hotbar.

pages.title: GUI Main Hand
pages.text: Current keybind: $(l)$(k:key.mimi.midi.gui.main)$()$(br2)Pressing this key opens the $(l:instrument_gui)Instrument GUI$(/l) for the instrument in your main hand, if there is one.

pages.title: GUI Off Hand
pages.text: Current keybind: $(l)$(k:key.mimi.midi.gui.off)$()$(br2)Pressing this key opens the $(l:instrument_gui)Instrument GUI$(/l) for the instrument in your off hand, if there is one.

pages.title: GUI Seated
pages.text: Current keybind: $(l)$(k:key.mimi.midi.gui.seat)$()$(br2)Pressing this key opens the $(l:instrument_gui)Instrument GUI$(/l) for the instrument that you are seated at, if there is one.
